replies.msg:
有左問題幾年。
初時西醫MTX無效，轉中醫。
中醫初時有效，差唔多好9成。
但有時又復發，我自己最嚴重會全身紅皮症。
一直睇中醫，最近又開始復發。
考慮試生物製劑。

搵過香港銀屑病友會，不過佢地WhatsApp group已滿。
佢地推介喺以下list搵皮膚科醫生：
https://www.mchk.org.hk/tc_chi/list_register/list.php?type=S&fromlist=Y&advancedsearch=Y&regno=S15

（我諗風濕科醫生都適合：
https://www.mchk.org.hk/tc_chi/list_register/list.php?type=S&fromlist=Y&advancedsearch=Y&regno=S23）

因為入唔到WhatsApp group，但又想approach下同路人，特別係想交換求醫資訊。
所以想至少暫時開個Telegram group，想交換同收集下資訊。

連結：
https://t.me/psohk

甩頭皮

同埋有關節位濕疹皮算唔算銀屑病？？？

如果淨係戒糖就無事，算唔算有病？

quote.msg:
甩頭皮

同埋有關節位濕疹皮算唔算銀屑病？？？

如果淨係戒糖就無事，算唔算有病？

replies.msg:
我認識都有限。
以我粗淺理解，銀屑病既病理機制係免疫系統攻擊返自己。

https://medicalinspire.com/web/posts/43398/【滿頭雪花】頭皮屑可分2種，去頭屑洗髮水有效解/
一般甩頭皮好似係有外因，而唔係源於自身免疫系統。

濕疹我都唔識，好似唔係主因免疫系統攻擊返自己？

戒糖就無事，就恭喜恭喜！

replies.msg:
尋晚傾完少少 由今日開始 應該唔會再睇中醫

Google了解多左生物製劑
再Google中藥

發覺中藥（雷公藤）既療效 係嚟自 抗腫瘤壞死因子
係下層既病發因子 唔係源頭

所以每次病發 都止唔到上層因子 譬如IL-23 IL-17

到最後好返 其實都係身體自然停爆IL-23 IL-17
中藥先清下層抗腫瘤壞死因子

尋晚Google後係咁現解
我爸有..已經三十年...解決唔到

Psoriasis initiation begins with environmental triggers and/or loss of tolerance, which leads to activation of plasmacytoid dendritic cells (pDCs) and IL-23-producing dermal DCs.

replies.msg:
https://www.healthline.com/health/psoriasis-vs-eczema-pictures#psoriasis-vs-eczema

Eczema, or atopic dermatitis, may also be a long-term condition affecting the skin. It occurs because of a hypersensitivity reaction. This causes the skin to overreact to certain triggers, such as dyes, fabrics, soaps, animals, and other irritants.

Psoriasis is a chronic autoimmune condition that results in the overproduction of skin cells. The dead cells build up into silvery-white scales. The skin becomes inflamed and red, causing serious itching.

濕疹係對外敏感，銀屑係內在免疫系統攻擊自己

戒口
全低糖油鹽脂
戒曬所有刺激性食物
唔好用類固醇
唔好曬太陽
唔好做運動
瘋狂搽天然保濕

replies.msg:
頭四項對任何人都多數有益

不過曬太陽同做運動 完全戒 未必有益

https://www.healthline.com/health/psoriasis/benefits-and-risks-of-sunlight#natural-sunlight
The sun’s ultraviolet rays are made up of UVA and UVB rays. UVB rays are more effective at treating psoriasis symptoms because they slow the rapid rate of skin growth and shedding. Although sunlight can benefit psoriasis, you should take care to protect yourself from sunburn.

https://www.health.harvard.edu/diseases-and-conditions/preventing-psoriasis-with-exercise
A study from Harvard-affiliated Brigham and Women's Hospital finds that vigorous exercise may help reduce the risk of psoriasis in women by 25 to 30%. "Inflammation is associated with the risk of psoriasis, and people who exercise vigorously may have less inflammation in their bodies," explains Dr. Abrar Qureshi, associate professor of dermatology at Harvard Medical School and the lead author of the study.

replies.msg:
上網睇：
$6000一針，起始時於第0，1，2，3 和4 週皮下注射，接著於第4 週開始每4 週皮下注射。
每次300 mg 劑量為給與兩次150 mg 皮下注射。 有些病人( 例如體重較輕者，<=60 kg)，可給與150 mg 的劑量。


你呢？係咪可以唔洗Regular每4週一針，情況好左可以隔疏d？

搵野見到：

銀屑病即牛皮癬 易惡化蔓延至關節 醫生：非傳染病但勿當濕疹醫
https://www.sundaykiss.com/健康/銀屑病-牛皮癬-難斷尾-惡化-濕疹-關節痛-439317/7/

自創食療戒糖戒小麥 英女治愈濕疹牛皮癬
https://www.am730.com.hk/news/新聞/自創食療戒糖戒小麥-英女治愈濕疹牛皮癬-102393

想搵既係呢個，不過search完無e-book

Advances in Psoriasis: A Multisystemic Guide
https://www.amazon.com/Advances-Psoriasis-Multisystemic-Jeffrey-Weinberg/dp/1447144317
http://library.lol/main/6E3A7D0051C8410B62CEA687E1EC2A08

The Psoriasis Diet Cookbook: Easy, Healthy Recipes to Soothe Your Symptoms
https://www.amazon.com/-/zh_TW/dp/1646111540
http://library.lol/main/DD351F25B34978C5BEF684D1A533D9BA

上面嗰本應該幾正

Our current understanding considers psoriasis to be triggered by exogenous or endogenous environmental stimuli in genetically susceptible individuals. Such stimuli include group A streptococcal pharyngitis, viremia, allergic drug reactions, antimalarial drugs, lithium, beta-blockers, IFN-α withdrawal of systemic corticosteroids, local trauma (Köebner phenomenon), and emotional stress.


我們目前的認識認為銀屑病是由遺傳易感個體的外源性或內源性環境刺激引發的。這類刺激包括A組鏈球菌咽炎、病毒血症、過敏性藥物反應、抗瘧藥、鋰、β-受體阻滯劑、IFN-α撤除全身皮質激素、局部創傷(Köebner現象)和情緒緊張等。

Additional studies have demonstrated that treatments that induce prolonged clearing of psoriatic lesions without continuous therapy, such as psoralen plus UVA irradiation, decreased the numbers of T cells in plaques by at least 90%. However, treatments that require continual therapy for satisfactory clinical results, such as cyclosporine and etretinate, simply suppress T-cell activity and proliferation.


另有研究表明，誘導銀屑病皮損長期清除而不需要持續治療的治療方法，如psoralen加UVA照射，可使斑塊中T細胞的數量至少減少90%。然而，需要持續治療才能獲得滿意臨床效果的治療方法，如環孢素和依曲肽，只是抑制了T細胞的活性和增殖。

quote.msg:
Additional studies have demonstrated that treatments that induce prolonged clearing of psoriatic lesions without continuous therapy, such as psoralen plus UVA irradiation, decreased the numbers of T cells in plaques by at least 90%. However, treatments that require continual therapy for satisfactory clinical results, such as cyclosporine and etretinate, simply suppress T-cell activity and proliferation.


另有研究表明，誘導銀屑病皮損長期清除而不需要持續治療的治療方法，如psoralen加UVA照射，可使斑塊中T細胞的數量至少減少90%。然而，需要持續治療才能獲得滿意臨床效果的治療方法，如環孢素和依曲肽，只是抑制了T細胞的活性和增殖。

replies.msg: 我應該會曬多d太陽

唔知遲d會唔會有平藥用：

Biosimilars
https://www.psoriasis.org/biologics/
Biosimilar medicines are a type of biologic drug, and may be administered via injections or intravenous infusion.
Biosimilars are highly similar to their biologic reference product.

Biosimilars for psoriasis: worldwide overview of regulatory guidelines, uptake and implications for dermatology clinical practice
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/28646580/

Biosimilars for the treatment of psoriasis
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/31237786/

Biosimilars in Psoriasis: The Future or Not?
https://www.mdedge.com/dermatology/article/130668/psoriasis/biosimilars-psoriasis-future-or-not?sso=true

In general, cost savings with biosimilars are less than those seen with generic small molecule agents. While cost reductions associated with small molecule generics can be 80% or higher, estimated biosimilar acquisition cost savings in the US have ranged from 10 to 40%. According to a 2017 estimate, the average cost for an 8-week supply of an infiximab biosimilar was 18% less than its reference product. Outside the US, cost savings on biosimilars are variable, ranging from as high as 70% in Norway (due to discounted government pricing) to 30% in India. Europe has approved 23 biosimilars, with an average price reduction of 20–30%.

While there are many potential triggers of psoriasis, infections are an important trigger and up to half of children with psoriasis have an exacerbation within 2 weeks following an upper respiratory infection. Psychological distress is a causative or maintaining factor in disease expression for many patients with psoriasis. Other well-documented triggers for fares include trauma, alcohol and smoking, as well as obesity. Plaque psoriasis is usually chronic with intermittent remissions. Plaques may persist for months to years at the same locations; however, periods of complete remission may occur.


雖然銀屑病的潛在誘因有很多，但感染是一個重要的誘因，高達一半的銀屑病患兒在上呼吸道感染後2週內就會加重。心理困擾是許多銀屑病患者疾病表現的誘因或維持因素。其他有據可查的誘發因素包括外傷、酒精和吸煙，以及肥胖。斑塊型銀屑病通常為慢性，間歇性緩解。斑塊可在同一部位持續數月至數年，但也可出現完全緩解期。

Guselkumab Efficacy after Withdrawal Is Associated with Suppression of Serum IL-23-Regulated IL-17 and IL-22 in Psoriasis: VOYAGE 2 Study
https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0022202X19317555

At week 28, patients with ≥90% Psoriasis Area and Severity Index improvement from baseline (PASI 90) were rerandomized to withdrawal and received placebo (n = 182), or maintenance therapy (n = 193).
Efficacy in the guselkumab maintenance group was sustained through week 72, whereas efficacy diminished in the guselkumab withdrawal group (PASI 90, 86.0% vs. 11.5%).
After 20 weeks of retreatment, 80.4% of guselkumab withdrawal patients achieved PASI 90 responses versus baseline.

http://www.derma.org.tw/CKEdit/upload/files/附件3%20%20Tremfya特諾雅%20_TFDA仿單.pdf
在第28週時為療效反應者 且於重新隨機分組後進入安慰劑組並退出TREMFYA®治療的受試 者中，喪失PASI 90療效反應的中位時間約為15週。

$6000一針，起始時於第0，1，2，3 和4 週皮下注射，接著於第4 週開始每4 週皮下注射。
每次300 mg 劑量為給與兩次150 mg 皮下注射。 有些病人( 例如體重較輕者，<=60 kg)，可給與150 mg 的劑量。
